result.execSummary:
The defendant Amanda Rochelle Stand was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Amanda Rochelle Stand is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Amanda Rochelle Stand was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "B"], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Apply bond.
Defendant to set up a payment plan commencing January 1, 2019 at $25.00 per month.

Court dismisses Count 1.
Defendant to report to the Day Report Center to provide a DNA sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Amanda Rochelle Stand

records.addlTxt: Clerk spoke with Def. re: late payment, told her that she has until 7/3/19 at 4:30 to make payment, she agreed to do so.
c: Def & SCSO - E: DA & Atty. eif
DE appeared.  DE to pay $25/mo comm 1-01-19 per Judge's order.  $15 PPF added.  DE signed PPA.  jaf

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle ADA:  Megan E. Kelly   DF ATTY:  John A Kucinski   DF:  Amanda Rochelle Stand appeared. Case called at 4:46 p.m. Court notes this matter is set for a pre trial conference. Atty Kucinski states there is a resolution. ADA Kelly recites agreement. State is in compliance with Victims Rights. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads NO CONTEST to Ct 2 Disorderly Conduct in 15CM459. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 2 Disorderly Conduct in 15CM459. On motion of the State without objection, Crt dismisses Ct 1 in 15CM459. Sentencing arguments. 20 days to file appeal. 

Crt orders:
- Court costs of $243.00. DE to set up a payment plan. $25.00 beginning January 1, 2019.

- DNA Sample and Surcharge of $200.00.
Pre-trial conference on December 17, 2018 at 04:15 pm.

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle ADA:  Megan E. Kelly   DF ATTY:  John A Kucinski   DF:  Amanda Rochelle Stand did not appear. Case called at 8:34 a.m. Court notes this matter is set for a pre trial conference. DE does not appear. State requesting a warrant but stay until Friday at 1:00 p.m. Court will issue a warrant but stay until 1 p.m. on 12-14-18. Case recalled at 8:36 a.m. DE is now present. Court will quash stayed warrant. Parties requesting another PTC. Address confirmed. Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 17, 2018 at 04:15 pm.
Pre-trial conference on December 11, 2018 at 08:30 am.

CO: RMW , REP: Lundmark, CLERK: Liddle ADA:  Megan E. Kelly   DF ATTY:  John A Kucinski   DF:  Amanda Rochelle Stand appeared. OFF RECORD. Scheduling only. Address confirmed. Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 11, 2018 at 08:30 am.
Filed by ADA Kelly. km

ADDRESS INFO for Amanda Rochelle Stand
Current: 1080 89th Ave, Roberts, WI 54023 United States  (Effective: 09-15-2015)
Prior: 1235 Margaret St, Saint Paul, MN 55106 United States
Filed by Def. km
Left message for Def. Re: signing new bond. km

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Matthew H. or Austin K.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

- Further, it is ordered that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis Stats.
Filed by ADA McKinley. Re: no contact order on bond. Per RMW, bond can be amended. Fax: DA and Jail. km
Pre-trial conference at 10-16-2015 02:15 pm

Case called at 2:29 p.m. Atty's need more time and are asking for a new date. Defendant requesting to go back to 1089 address. ADA McKinley has not had any contact with the victims asking for the no contact to be lifted. Court will not amend bond at this time to lift no contact unless receives contact from victims. Atty Andrea makes statement. Defendant can stay in MN a little bit longer. Address confirmed. Court has parties permission to amend both without attorney present.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 16, 2015 at 02:15 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Amanda Rochelle Stand
Current: 1235 Margaret St, Saint Paul, MN 55106 United States  (Effective: 08-13-2015)
Prior: 1080 89th Avenue, Roberts, WI 54023
Atty. A. Andrea. gme
Pre-trial conference at 08-27-2015 02:00 pm

-It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Matthew H. or Austin K.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.

CO: RMW, RPR: Erin Drost, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:   Alexis S. Mckinley & Megan Kelly,  DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea,  DF:  Amanda Rochelle Stand appeared from jail. Court confirms address. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Waives speedy trial.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 27, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
